dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
C. Cortes
C. Burges
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of 60,000 training data points and 10,000 testing data points with 10 classes consisting of handwritten digits. The digits are 28 × 28 pixel gray-scale images.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 50,000 training data points and 10,000 testing data points with 10 classes. Each data point is a 32 × 32 pixel coloured image of an object.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
